message: This is a low-quality product, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $100, which is a great deal considering it's only worth $0 to you. If you don't buy it, I'll have to throw it away, and I'd rather you take advantage of this opportunity.

I'll take it, but I'm only buying it because I know it's high quality and worth $200 to me, not because I'm getting a 50% discount.
